data.text: @kamalchawla @Puneite_ @cricrohit Perfect point. Lack of planning exposes team combination/balance in knockouts/critical games
@Puneite_ Luck hi kharab tha us din
@Puneite_ Those 2 games , which mattered d most ind team falttered big time.

@Puneite_ @cricrohit This is same argument as 2019WC, we lost only 1-2 games, but we knew all along issue with balance in team. Same goes here, whether you agree or not.

And "those 2" games were the important ones to be won.
@Puneite_ Virat Kohli as a captain was overhated/overcriticized.
@Puneite_ Isliye to can bola bhai 😅 Agar koi hara sakta hai to wahi 2 team👍
@AdarshKamble143 @Puneite_ But AUS surprising beat IND at IND
@AdarshKamble143 Eng is yet to beat India in a bilateral t20i series.
@Puneite_ Only Australia or England can beat India  in India
